# <span class="glyphicon glyphicon-calendar" aria-hidden="true"></span> Evaluation Calendar
Written assignments are to be submitted via Quercus (please see the assignments section). The deadline for submission of assignments is 11:59am EST on Mondays (1 hour before class starts).

```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
jsc270courseassschedule <- read_csv("JSC270-winter2021-assignments-schedule.csv")
knitr::kable(jsc270courseassschedule[1:6,])
```

<br>
